name: get_raster_tile
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mapilion_vector_and_raster_map_tiles.
Tool description: Mapilion provides you with vector and raster map tiles at scale. Based on OpenStreetMap and OpenMapTiles.
API description: Returns Raster tiles as PNG. These can be used in mapping libraries like Leaflet. The style-name can be one of:
- `kurviger-liberty` a map style developed for Kurviger.de
- `osm-bright` the default Osm Bright style

style_name.description: The name of the map style. Options include `kurviger-liberty` and `osm-bright`.

z.description: The zoom level of the tile.
